page.title: 06GOVERMENT HEALTH ECONOMICS
page.content: { GOVERNMENT} Parish Council elected every 4 years. Area council covering housing, environment, health, street lighting and refuse collection. The County Council, roads, education, fire service, police, probation service, registration of births and deaths, social services, care of the elderly and handicapped._ {HEALTH Clinics for the very young are held in South Leverton Institute. A doctor lives in village. There are health visitors.There is an ambulance service to hospitals in town. Area Hospital at Worksop or Lincoln. Children medically checked while at school, a mobile chiropody unit visits the village. . {ECONOMICS }The giro Bank is available at the Post Office. Other banks are within 5 miles, generally all use Retford Banks 75% children have own account.
